Flow.description: Migrated from the workflow 1. Activate external View 2. Factoring View 3. Reverse Factoring View 4. Ready for posting (update date) 5. Waiting for Allications date 6. UPDATE COM % INVOICE 7. first invoice for Map 8. Funder supplier rate update 9. Update due date delta bucket 10. Update Invoice Amount 11. Update in Progress Date Migrated from the Process Builder 1. Update invoice with Map Data v2 (some duplicate with 6) 2. Update instruction for Ops Invoice 3. Update Agent from Map+trustee

formulas.name: ComSalesBuyer
ComSalesSupplier
due_date_delta_bucket
formulas.expression: IF((0 > {!due_date_delta} && {!due_date_delta} > -8), '06. Overdue 1-7', IF((-7 > {!due_date_delta} && {!due_date_delta} > -15), '07. Overdue 8-14', IF((-14 > {!due_date_delta} && {!due_date_delta} > -31), '08. Overdue 15-30', IF((-30 > {!due_date_delta} && {!due_date_delta} > -60), '09. Overdue 31-59', IF(({!due_date_delta} = -60 || -60 > {!due_date_delta}), '10. Overdue 60+', IF((({!due_date_delta} = 0 || 0 < {!due_date_delta}) && {!due_date_delta} < 8), '01. Due 0-7', IF((7 < {!due_date_delta} && {!due_date_delta} < 15), '02. Due 8-14', IF((14 < {!due_date_delta} && {!due_date_delta} < 31), '03. Due 15-30', IF((30 < {!due_date_delta} && {!due_date_delta} < 60), '04. Due 31-59', IF((60 < {!due_date_delta} || {!due_date_delta} = 60), '05. Due 60+', NULL))))))))))

formulas.name: percentage_of_financing
formulas.expression: If( Not(IsBlank({!$Record.Supplier_Buyer_Map__r.Percentage_of_financin_Manualg__c})), {!$Record.Supplier_Buyer_Map__r.Percentage_of_financin_Manualg__c} , If( Buyer_Insured_By = 'Volofin', 0.85 , If( AND( Buyer_Insured_By = 'ICIEC', Not( {!$Record.Supplier_Buyer_Map__r.Buyer__c} = '0010I00002ByYt8')), 0.80 , If( {!$Record.Supplier_Buyer_Map__r.Principal_amount_for_SDR__c}, 1.00 , If( IsPickVal({!$Record.Supplier_Buyer_Map__r.Supplier__r.Country_of_Incorporation__c}, 'Bangladesh'), 0.95 , If( Begins({!$Record.Supplier_Buyer_Map__r.Incomlend_product__r.Name}, 'In Transit'), 0.8 , 0.90))))))

formulas.name: Sales_Owner_Set_DD
formulas.expression: IF( OR ( ISBLANK( {!$Record.Supplier_Buyer_Map__r.Buyer__r.Sales_Owner__c} ), ISBLANK( {!$Record.Supplier_Buyer_Map__r.Supplier__r.Sales_Owner__c} )), FALSE, TRUE)

formulas.name: Sales_zone
formulas.expression: IF( OR ( ISBLANK( {!$Record.Supplier_Buyer_Map__r.Buyer_Sales_Zone__c} ), ISBLANK( {!$Record.Supplier_Buyer_Map__r.Supplier_Zone__c} )), FALSE, TRUE)
